Name: M 119 - Marc Landis - Democratic Elections Commissioner for New York County.
Title: RESOLUTION APPOINTING MARK LANDIS AS A COMMISSIONER OF THE NEW YORK CITY BOARD OF ELECTIONS.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was P-C Item Approved by Comm
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Attachments.Name: New York Democratic County Committee Appointment Letter

Text: RESOLVED, pursuant Section 3-204 of the New York State Election Law, the Council hereby appoints of Marc Landis as a commissioner of the New York City Board of Elections to serve the remainder of a four-year term that expires on December 31, 2026.

\cf1 RESOLVED, pursuant \cf0 Section 3-204 of the New York State Election Law,\cf1  the Council hereby appoints of \cf0 Marc Landis\b  \b0 as a commissioner of the New York City Board of Elections to serve the remainder of a four-year term that expires on December 31, 2026.\par
